long_desc.thetext:
The following methods in qx.io.remote.transport.Iframe are unimplemented or improperly implemented. If we intend to keep Iframe transport around, it should be finished.
getStatusCode always returns 200. This is BAD BAD BAD BAD BAD
setRequestHeader() does nothing
getResponseHeader() always returns null
getResponseHeaders() always returns an empty map
getStatusText always returns an empty string
You are completely right, Derrell. But I think we can't get that done in the next couple of month. Do you want to take care of it yourself? Otherwise, I assign the bug to someone in the core team.

Martin, I'd love to finish this, but... (there's always a "but" isn't there?)
I think there are a few other higher-priority qooxdoo issues that are assigned to me, awaiting me having some amount of time to devote to them. I think this one should probably be left in the pool or assigned to someone else if it's to be done in a timely manner.
Derrell
Our current bug process demands an assignee so I take it myself. But as I said, I don't think we can get to that issue soon. So if you think you have time, just take the bug from me. ;)
When working on this bug, you may take another look at #4206.
We decided not to implement the Iframe transport in the new transport layer for now. Instead, we'll be evaluating if modern XHR can be used instead. See bug 5211.
